General.Name: Sunnova Energy International Inc
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Sunnova Energy International Inc. provides energy as a service in the United States. The company offers electricity, as well as offers operations and maintenance, monitoring, repairs and replacements, equipment upgrades, on-site power optimization, and diagnostics services. As of December 31, 2022, it operated a fleet of residential solar energy systems with a generation capacity of approximately 1,627 megawatts serving over 279,000 customers. Sunnova Energy International Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 20 East Greenway Plaza, Houston, TX, United States, 77046
